forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon ushers in a gentle embrace of mostly sunny skies, where the high creeps toward a cool 59 degrees, dipping slightly as the day wanes. A light north-northeast breeze weaves through the city, whispering of the approaching twilight. Despite the brighter moments of the day, a thin veil of cloudiness begins to blanket the horizon, hinting at the evening's promise of a cooler, more subdued ambiance, settling into the low 40s. The marine layer lurks quietly, just beyond the Golden Gate, leaving an ethereal haze along the water’s edge but refraining from casting a heavy fog across the urban core.

Dressing in layers is prudent; a light sweater or jacket will provide comfort against the refreshing breeze and evening chill. Seek out a cozy café for an afternoon respite or take a leisurely stroll along the shoreline to appreciate the soft play of light on the bay, where the horizon blurs into a canvas of muted blues and whites. Engaging with the scenery of this iconic city is always a worthwhile endeavor, as the day cools gracefully into night, inviting a moment of reflection amid the bustle.
